cookiebanner.header.name: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. If you want to know more about how our cookies are used, please see our privacy policy.
cookiebanner.header.button.name: Cookie Policy
cookiebanner.deny.button.name: Deny
cookiebanner.accept.button.name: Accept
cookiebanner.content.header: Cookies policy. Cookies are small text files that are copied to Your hard disk without cookies website does not cause any damage. Cookies from us ,This website does not collect any of your personal information. You can disable cookies at any time through the settings in your browser. We use cookies strictly for statistical purposes and all identities and information remain anonymous. Cookies will be used by our staff for Evaluations and improvements to ensure that we are develop as a website and provide the best service possible if cookies will be used additional purposes you will be notified of any such implementations.
cookiebanner.content.sub1: 1. What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that are downloaded to the customer's computer. This allows us BFproperty To track the popularity of the site so we know we are doing things right
cookiebanner.content.sub2: 2. Benefits of cookies. Websites can provide customers with better experiences that increase efficiency and meet their future needs. The information gathered will be used By BFproperty Therefore, any transfer of cookie data will not occur. Cookies also save the default settings of this website, helping customers get the same Preference settings. If cookies are deleted, any settings will return to their initial state.
cookiebanner.content.sub3: 3 Cookies are completely safe and do not harm or slow your computer in any way
cookiebanner.content.sub4: 4. Cookies do not collect information about your personal details, Personal Information must be obtained with the client's consent before compilation
cookiebanner.content.sub5: 5.How to disable cookies. Customers can disable cookie settings by by using the browsers settings tab and setting privacy settings to limit cookies collection in the future.
